column4: If I install with ubuntu desktop, how hard is it to install server stuff (LAMP mostly)?
there are some very good how-to's for ubuntu, with those you shuld be up and running in about 5/10 minutes
nickrud, thanks - I seem to recall last time I did this there was a little trick to doing it.  Perhaps it's just easier now.
wow, tasksel is very cool!  Thanks for that tip.
